insight: The 28 nuclear states admit an incidence-only adjacency |B∩B′|=1 yielding the unique Coxeter graph, whose 7 missing 4-subsets automatically form a 2-(7,4,2) design whose complements are the unique STS(7) - the Fano plane is reconstructed from the 112 without importing geometry, making it a "genetic code" that forces the 7-fold macro-structure.
